mapper.select: SELECT A.article_pk, A.title, A.description, A.img, A.uri, A.like, A.timestamp, U.user_pk, U.name, U.img_thumb_profile FROM (SELECT * FROM article WHERE category = #{category}) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS U ON A.user_fk = U.user_pk ORDER BY A.like DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{viewing_article_number}
